data_table.description: Personal History Form, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: PHX1
variable.description: A. Household Sociodemographics. Q1. Income Letter [Personal History Form]

variable.name: PHX2
variable.description: A. Household Sociodemographics. Q2. Number of people supported by income [Personal History Form]

variable.name: PHX3
variable.description: A. Household Sociodemographics. Q3.Self-reported financial situation [Personal History Form]

variable.name: PHX4
variable.description: A. Household Sociodemographics. Q4. Self-reported community standing [Personal History Form]

variable.name: PHX0AY
variable.description: Administrative Information. Year of completion date [Personal History Form]
